raw: Remote work during coronavirus outbreak puts millions more on Microsoft Teams, Slack .
replaced: Remote work during coronavirus outbreak puts millions more on Microsoft Teams, Slack .

raw: ( Reuters ) - Microsoft Corp ’s Teams chat and conferencing app gained more than 12 million daily users in one week , a 37.5 % jump as more people worked from home during the coronavirus outbreak , the company said on Thursday .
replaced: ( Reuters ) - Microsoft ’s Teams chat and conferencing app gained more than 12 million daily users in one week , a 37.5 % jump as more people worked from home during coronavirus outbreak , Microsoft said on Thursday .

raw: The Microsoft logo is pictured ahead of the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona , Spain February 24 , 2019 .
replaced: The Microsoft logo is pictured ahead of the Mobile World Congress in Barcelona , Spain February 24 , 2019 .

raw: REUTERS / Sergio Perez / File Photo Teams had 44 million users as of March 18 , Microsoft said , more than double the 20 million daily active users that the software maker reported in November .
replaced: Microsoft Teams had 44 million users as of March 18 , Microsoft said , more than double the 20 million daily active users that Microsoft reported in November .

raw: Teams users grew from 32 million to 44 million in the period between March 11 and March 18 alone , as many more U.S. companies asked employees to work from home , Microsoft said .
replaced: Teams users grew from 32 million to 44 million in the period between March 11 and March 18 alone , as many more U.S. companies asked employees to work from home , Microsoft said .

raw: There were no comparable recent numbers for the major rival to Teams , collaboration app Slack Technologies Inc , which said in October that it had 12 million daily active users .
replaced: There were no comparable recent numbers for Slack  Slack had 12 million daily active users .

raw: Slack did not update that figure during its earnings announcement on March 12 , but said four of its five largest deals in the most recent quarter were won against Microsoft Teams .
replaced: Slack did not update that figure during Slack earnings announcement on March 18 , but said four of Slack five largest deals in the most recent quarter were won against Microsoft Teams .

raw: On Thursday , Slack said it added 7,000 new paid customers from Feb. 1 to March 18 , a roughly 40 % increase over each of its previous two fiscal quarters , when it had added about 5,000 new paid customers per quarter .
replaced: On Thursday , Slack said Slack added 7,000 new paid customers from Feb. 1 to March 18 , a roughly 40 % increase over each of Slack previous two fiscal quarters , when Slack had added about 5,000 new paid customers per quarter .

raw: Microsoft also rolled out several features designed to help with telemedicine and working from home , such as a bookings application for Teams to help hospitals manage virtual appointments .
replaced: Microsoft also rolled out several features designed to help with telemedicine and working from home , such as a bookings application for Teams to help hospitals manage virtual appointments .

raw: “ As organizations around the world are changing the way they work in response to the ( coronavirus ) situation , we ’re going to learn a tremendous amount , ” Satya Nadella , Microsoft ’s chief executive , said in a virtual news conference .
replaced: “ As organizations around the world are changing the way organizations around the world work in response to the ( coronavirus ) situation , we ’re going to learn a tremendous amount , ” Satya Nadella , Microsoft ’s chief executive , said in a virtual news conference .

raw: Microsoft charges fees to businesses for its full versions of Teams , but there is a free version that can be used by consumers .
replaced: Microsoft charges fees to businesses for Microsoft full versions of Teams , but there is a free version that can be used by consumers .

raw: Microsoft said Thursday that doctors at St. Luke ’s University Health Network in Pennsylvania , who had already been using the Teams app , will start tapping it for videoconferencing with patients , including those vulnerable to the novel coronavirus , to protect patients and the hospital .
replaced: Microsoft said Thursday that doctors at St. Luke ’s University Health Network in Pennsylvania , who had already been using the Teams app , will start tapping the Teams app for videoconferencing with patients , including those vulnerable to the coronavirus , to protect patients and the hospital .

raw: Slack earlier this week said it was making the service free for many organizations working to respond to or mitigate the coronavirus and was speeding up the set - up time for new customers .
replaced: Slack earlier this week said Slack was making the service free for many organizations working to respond to or mitigate the coronavirus and was speeding up the set - up time for new customers .

raw: Microsoft also said it was working on several new features using artificial intelligence that could make working from home easier for Teams users .
replaced: Microsoft also said Microsoft was working on several new features using artificial intelligence that could make working from home easier for Teams users .

raw: One feature can automatically replace the background during a video chat , for example cropping out a messy home bedroom and replacing it with a picture of a tidy commercial office .
replaced: One feature can automatically replace the background during a video chat , for example cropping out a messy home bedroom and replacing a messy home bedroom with a picture of a tidy commercial office .

raw: Another feature can filter out background sounds during a conference call , such as the crinkling of a plastic potato chip bag .
replaced: Another feature can filter out background sounds during a conference call , such as the crinkling of a plastic potato chip bag .
